template.p: Seamlessly transition from sales to project execution with an integrated workflow. Our system ensures that your sales orders automatically transform into structured projects, saving time and improving efficiency.

Sales Order Templates: Load up predefined sales order templates that include structured sections, products, and essential details. Add extra notes for descriptions and easily include terms & conditions to ensure clarity in every transaction.

Automated Project Creation: When a sales order includes a specific service‚Äîsuch as "MyWeddingCompany Service"‚Äîa corresponding project can automatically be generated based on the predefined product template. This eliminates manual setup and ensures consistency in project execution.

Task & Subtask Management: Each project consists of structured tasks essential for preparation, such as wedding planning steps. Tasks can be further broken down into multiple subtasks, each with a detailed view to track progress effectively.

Comprehensive Tracking & Insights: Monitor key project metrics effortlessly. Use the dashboard button within the kanban view to track timesheets, vendor bills, milestones, and other critical indicators, ensuring smooth project management from start to finish.
